entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:30 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 12:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: ENE 43 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early this afternoon then changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain this evening. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
